snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin searched hard for something positive to say Monday, the day after his team allowed 350 rushing yards and endured a fourth-quarter meltdown against Seattle.
abstract: New York Giants and coach Tom Coughlin are searching for something positive to cling to after allowing 350 rushing yards and enduring fourth-quarter meltdown against Seattle Seahawks for their fourth defeat in a row; Coughlin, in his 11th season, sounds like a coach feeling the heat despite his two Super Bowl triumphs.
lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin searched hard for something positive to say Monday, the day after his team allowed 350 rushing yards and endured a fourth-quarter meltdown against Seattle.

headline.main: Day After Being Run Over, the Giants Look to Recover
headline.print_headline: Day After Being Run Over, the Giants Look to Recover
